Entries.Sable: Wow, that's for me? So sweet of you </64 921 612 795 459/Ah, that looks interesting. Thanks!/838 564 578 203 527 206 422 772 340 445 303 348 88/Hmm, I'll throw this in the cauldron and see what happens./196 253 84 575 227 305 344 78/Hey. I don't like that. Take a note./903 607 241 424 330 426 256 -20 635/I think I'll find some use for this./-79 -75 -4 -74 -81 -26/

Entries.Sable0: It's all so... exciting and just unimaginable!$6#$b#...You really love me, don't you?$3
Entries.Sable1: Oh my, I'm so excited!!$3#$b#I won't be able to sleep tonight...$7

Entries.SableRoom.1: An alluring magic glow emanates from the crystal ball.
Entries.SableRoom.2: The table is studded with fragrant herbs, glitter and minerals.
Entries.SableRoom.4: The book 'Witchcraft for Beginners' is open on the page about the time spell.
Entries.SableRoom.5: The tree's thin branches are sagging slightly under the weight of the ripe magical fruit. You can only guess what they taste like.
Entries.SableRoom.6: The soft plush bunny looks shabby.
Entries.SableRoom.7: Girl in the picture reminds you of a young Sable, but the longer you look at her face, the more foreign it seems.
Entries.SableRoom.8: The old sideboard is covered with a thick layer of dust. It seems that the dishes inside haven't felt the warmth of human hands for a long time.
Entries.SableRoom.9: The mineral is mesmerizing in its luster. The note next to it reads, in big letters, 'Hands off!'
Entries.MysteriousPhoto: From the glossy surface of the picture, two red-haired girls are staring at you, resembling each other like two peas in a pod. They look happy. These faces seem painfully familiar to you.
Entries.MysteriousLetter: ...I've always been a coward.^And she was a daredevil.^I've always been naive and weak.^And she was so clever and strong.^Now she's gone. No one will remember her, as if she never even existed.^And I still can't understand... Why me? Maybe fate punished me for my weakness, naivety, and cowardice. If only I could go back to that day and pretend to be her just for a moment!^^^^^^^^^^^But since then, I have to wear her guise for the rest of my life. [letterbg Mods/Fernandtea.NewNPCSabl/LetterBackgrounds 0][textcolor black]

Entries.Utility.cs.5367: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if he'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sable in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5369: When @ first arrived in Pelican Town, no one knew if she'd fit in with our community...#$b#But from this day forward, @ is going to be as much a part of this town as any of us!$h#$b#It is my great honor on this day {0} of {1}, to unite @ and Sable in the bonds of marriage.
Entries.Utility.cs.5373: @... Sable... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you husband and wife!$h
Entries.Utility.cs.5375: @... Sable... #$b# As the mayor of Pelican Town, and regional bearer of the matrimonial seal, I now pronounce you wife and... well, wife!$h

Entries.Sable: Such a lovely spring day is perfect for a festival!$1#$e#Mhm... I won't play.$2#$b#I'll just stay here, okay?$7
Entries.Sable_Spouse: @!$1#$b#You can do it!$1#$b#Abigail is a serious competitor, but she's not a problem for you.#$e#Mentally I am always with you.

Entries.Sable: Yeah... Wilford was soo nervous about this day.#$b#He was in his workshop all day long, and I had to do all the housework all by myself!$7#$b#I advise you to praise him...
Hello, my love.$6#$b#The sun lights up the whole meadow, that's why it's so warm and cozy.$1#$e#I'm waiting for your invitation.$1
Did Wilford work overnights again for this day?#$b#I think he takes it too seriously...$2#$e#Sebastian definitely won't ask me to the dance, so I don't see the point in sticking around here.$8
Wilford was up all night calculating the perfect ingredients for the soup, so he had already added everything up for us.$7
Oh, here you are!$6#$e#I've already had time to fill my belly with all the goodies from the festive table.$2#$b#Don't worry, I specifically left some room for a bowl of soup.$1
I added a couple of cranberries and banana slices to the soup.$1#$b#It must be really, really good.$6
So. Beautiful.#$b#I can't take my eyes off the dark water.$1
Entries.Sable_Spouse: Hello, sunshine.$4#$b#I was waiting for you.$6#$b#It's so beautiful here, isn't it? This evening is filled with a kind of magical atmosphere.$1

Entries.Sable: I'm full of energy today!$6#$e#The fortune teller shared a couple of magical secrets with me.$6#$e#Now leave. Do not destroy my mysterious image.$7
Entries.Sable_Spouse: Hi there. *kisses*$1#$b#Do you want to compete in slingshotting?#$e#How's your grange display?#$b#If I had been assigned to judge the exhibition, I would have given you first place without a second thought!$1#$b#Not very fair? No way.

Entries.Sable: S-sam, why don't we go back?$7#$b#It's so creepy in here!$3
Entries.Sable_Spouse: @!$3#$b#Looking for a way out as well?..$2#$b#And we seem to be lost...$7

Entries.Sable: So cold, isn't it?$1#$e#Did you see those igloos? So cool!$6
Entries.Sable_Spouse: Will you participate in the ice fishing contest?$1#$b#I'd like to, but I'm not much of a fisherman...$7#$b#I'm not that patient.

Entries.Sable: Such a lovely day...#$e#Watching all these happy people makes me feel sad...$8#$e#I'm glad I moved here.#$b#Wilford replaced my family and gave me the kind of care I needed.
Hello, my winter starlet.$6#$b#We are now a family and can celebrate the end of the year together.#$b#I'm happy to be with you.$1
Well, here comes another year to an end...$2#$b#I don't wanna be sad, so I better go fill my stomach with something tasty.$1

Entries.summer_Sun4: How did I meet Sable?#$b#I found her sitting outside a closed bakery late at night.$9#$b#As it later turned out, she had once again run away from home. Her relationship with her family was strained.$10
Entries.winter_Tue4: Sable can be pretty naughty at times, but I only perceive her as a traumatized child.#$b#It's hard for me to scold her for something, and she makes good use of it.$7
Entries.winter_Sun4: Thanks to Sable, I can finally develop my cooking skill.#$b#She's a good taster.$8
Hi. How's Sable doing?#$b#I hope your house is still in one piece.$1#$b#Haha, just kidding.$7
Entries.winter_Sat4: Say hello to Sable for me.
Entries.fall_Wed8: Well, we're a lot closer now than we were before.$1#$b#Can we be called a family? Considering that Sable is like native to me.
Entries.summer_Wed8: Stop by sometime for a visit.#$b#After Sable moved out, I realized what 'hollow in the house' meant.
Entries.summer_Tue6: How's it going over there?#$b#If you need anything, just let me know.$1
Entries.Fri6: Sable looks happy beside you.#$b#Don't hurt her, okay?$6

Entries.Tue4: Hey, how's Wilford? Did he pass me any goodies?$1#$b#No? What a meanie.
Entries.fall_Sun4: Both floors of the house are now at my disposal.#$b#It's cool, of course, but there are drawbacks.#$b#For example, the lack of good food and Wilford himself.$2

BeforeMovie.Text: Wow, I love that.$1#$b#The plot promises to be dark and mysterious...$6

DuringMovie.Script: /shake Sable 2000/pause 500/message "Sable seems to be fully immersed in the plot of the film."

AfterMovie.Text: That was cool! Thanks for the invitation.$6

BeforeMovie.Text: Ooh, that looks creepy. And mysterious. Let's have a watch!$1

AfterMovie.Text: I really enjoyed it! It was super scary.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: I'm afraid the movie may bring back painful memories for me...$2

AfterMovie.Text: Sorry, I need some time alone.$2

BeforeMovie.Text: We have to pick the best seats.$1

AfterMovie.Text: Thanks, I had a great time.$1#$b#Which of the characters did you like best?

BeforeMovie.Text: Well, are you ready?$1#$b#Then let's hurry up.$6

AfterMovie.Text: Even though the movie wasn't a mysterious one, I still really enjoyed it.$1

BeforeMovie.Text: We need to take more snacks to keep ourselves entertained while we watch.

DuringMovie.Text: *yawns* The plot is a bit corny and bland.

AfterMovie.Text: I wasn't very interested in the movie.$2#$b#At least you were there.$1

he doesn't know much about me.$2"/pause 500/playMusic woodsTheme/pause 500/speak Sable "When I was a kid, we lived in a beautiful cabin in the Fern Islands.#$b#Our parents have been pretty busy people for as long as I can remember, they were always working."/pause 500/emote Sable 12/pause 1500/speak Sable "...They weren't there when it happened.$8"/stopMusic/pause 500/faceDirection Sable 2 true/pause 1000/speak Sable "...$8#$b#...$9#$b#...$11"/pause 500/playMusic AbigailFlute/pause 500/speak Sable "Don't ask me who did it.$11#$b#I didn't know his name.$12"/pause 500/speak Sable "This scar reminds me of how weak I was.$10"/pause 500/speak Sable "That day...$10#$b#...a part of me died.$11"/pause 500/emote Sable 12/pause 1500/speak Sable "Since then, I've been looking for a spell that reverses time.$12#$b#The thought of what I could have done then to prevent it still haunts me.$10"/pause 500/move farmer 0 -1 0/pause 750/quickQuestion #You can't live in the past forever.#You were only a child, it's not your fault.(break)speak Sable "I'd really like to agree with you if it wasn't so complicated.$12#$b#When you lose something very important, the whole world stops mattering, you know?$11"(break)speak Sable "Even so, it's hard to get rid of that feeling...$10"/pause 1500/stopMusic/speak Sable "Well.$12#$b#Thanks for listening.$13"/pause 500/speak Sable "I guess...$12#$b#I should...$9#$b#...apologize to Wilford."/pause 500/move Sable 0 4 2/faceDirection farmer 2 true/move Sable 1 0 1/move Sable 0 9 2/playSound stairsdown/warp Sable -100 -100 2/pause 1000/emote farmer 28/pause 2000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/friendship Wilford 0/friendship Sable 10/end

Why did you call me here?"/pause 750/question wizardtalk "#Someone wants to meet you."/fork 3876893_wizardtalk/switchEvent 3876893_wizardtalk
Entries.3876893_wizardtalk: pause 500/speak Sable "That's how...$7#$b#Okay, I'm intrigued. Let's go!$1"/pause 750/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/warp Sable 6 28 0/warp farmer 5 28 0/viewport 15 26 true/faceDirection farmer 0 true/faceDirection Sable 0 true/pause 2500/faceDirection farmer 1 500/faceDirection Sable 1 true/pause 500/faceDirection Sable 0 true/pause 500/faceDirection Sable 3 true/warp farmer 8 24 0/playSound stairsdown/move farmer 0 -2 0/speed Sable 3/move Sable -2 0 3/pause 250/jump Sable 8/emote Sable 16/pause 750/speed Sable 3/move Sable 0 -3 0/emote farmer 28/pause 500/speed Sable 3/move Sable -4 0 3/pause 250/jump Sable 8/pause 500/shake Wizard 1000/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 500/speak Wizard "What a noise!"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sable 1 true/pause 250/jump Sable 8/pause 500/speak Sable "Y-You are...$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 500/speak Wizard "So this is the young witch who is trying to interfere with the time continuum?"/pause 1000/speak Sable "...W-what?$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 500/showFrame Wizard 18/textAboveHead Wizard "*sighs*"/pause 1750/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 500/move Wizard 0 2 2/move Wizard -2 0 3/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/move Wizard 0 2 0/move Wizard -2 0 3/pause 1000/move Wizard 0 -4 0/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 500/emote Sable 16/pause 1500/speak Sable "...There's so much I wanted to tell you...$3"/speak Wizard "Let me start first."/pause 500/move Wizard -1 0 3/pause 250/move Wizard 0 1 2/pause 1000/speak Wizard "Come here, child."/pause 500/move Sable 1 0 2/move Sable 0 1 2/pause 500/faceDirection Sable 1 true/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/faceDirection farmer 3 true/pause 1000/playMusic Icicles/pause 1750/speak Wizard "Lately I have begun to notice more and more often the interference of extraneous witch forces in the magical field of this valley.#$b#Clots of dark energy began to accumulate in the thick of the forest, spawning slimes and shadow brutes."/pause 750/speak Wizard "The dark energy started spreading around since your arrival."/pause 650/speak Wizard "Tell me, who is your mentor?"/pause 1000/speak Sable "...I'm self-taught.$7"/pause 500/speak Wizard "Well, that makes sense then.#$b#I suppose there was no one to explain to you the dangers of the one powerful spell you're trying so hard to master?"/pause 650/emote Sable 4/pause 1750/speak Wizard "You see, time is like a treacherous beast that even the strongest wizards cannot curb."/pause 650/speak Wizard "Your attempts only open time vortices and release dark energy, poisoning the environment and, above all, you yourself."/pause 500/faceDirection Sable 2 true/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/pause 750/showFrame Sable 18/textAboveHead Sable "*coughs*"/pause 1500/faceDirection Sable 2 true/pause 1000/speak Wizard "I understand what you're doing all this for."/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 750/speak Wizard "But by wasting energy on such a complicated spell, you are slowly killing yourself.#$b#Moreover, even the slightest influence on the past can lead to the most unpredictable results in the present."/pause 500/showFrame Sable 18/emote Sable 12/pause 1500/speak Wizard "Are you willing to destroy dozens of lives to save one wounded soul?"/pause 650/emote Sable 12/pause 2000/speak Sable "...I don't want anyone else to get hurt because of me.$8"/pause 750/faceDirection Wizard 2 true/stopMusic/pause 750/speak Wizard "You can use your powers for good.#$b#I can help."/pause 500/faceDirection Sable 2 true/jump Sable 8/emote Sable 16/pause 1000/faceDirection Sable 1 true/pause 250/speak Sable "Are you serious??$3"/pause 500/faceDirection Wizard 3 true/pause 500/speak Wizard "Absolutely. I see in you an exceptional talent for the art of magic.#$b#But that's only on the condition that you give up trying to manipulate time and devote yourself to learning under my guidance."/pause 750/faceDirection Sable 2 true/pause 750/showFrame Sable 18/emote Sable 40/pause 1750/speak Wizard "Each of us had to sacrifice something to be able to help others.#$b#You're looking for redemption, aren't you?"/pause 1000/faceDirection Sable 2 true/pause 1000/faceDirection Sable 1 true/pause 1000/playMusic junimoStarSong/speak Sable "All right.#$b#I want to be useful."/pause 750/speak Wizard "Glad to hear that."/pause 500/speak Wizard "Well, then, wait for my letter with further instructions."/pause 750/emote Sable 32/pause 250/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/stopMusic/friendship Sable 20/mail ThanksSable/end

Entries.3876993/t 700 1300/n SableDate/z winter: spring_day_ambient/-1000 -1000/farmer 48 32 1 Sable 51 32 3/viewport 50 32/skippable/pause 2000/speak Sable "I'm so glad to see you!$6"/pause 500/emote farmer 32/pause 1000/speak Sable "Anyway, I recently passed long-distance teleportation examination. Mr. Rasmodius even praised me.$1#$b#Even though I messed up the coordinates a little bit at the beginning because of the anxiety.$7"/pause 500/speak Sable "But it was then that I thought about the fact that now I would be able to visit my native land without spending money on a trip!$1"/pause 500/speak Sable "Sooo, are you ready to travel a little?"/pause 750/question nochoicelol "#Of course!"/fork 3876993_nochoicelol/switchEvent 3876993_nochoicelol
